name: Stage Group (p)
title: TNM 7 Stage Group
notes:
**Note 1:** The Stage Groups displayed are the enhanced UICC groups.  If your registry submits the directly assigned Stage Groups to agencies other than SEER, please check the AJCC manual to ensure you are using the appropriate logic.

**Note 2:** Stage groups are based on histology, which is divided as follows:                     
* Squamous: 8000-8046, 8051-8131, 8148-8157, 8230-8249, 8508, 8510-8513, 8560-8570, 8575, 8950, 8980-8981           
* Adenocarcinoma: 8050, 8140-8147, 8160-8162, 8170-8175, 8180-8221, 8250-8507, 8514-8551, 8571-8574, 8576, 8940-8941
